item.title: Berry Corp (bry) 10-K
item.description: Berry Corp (bry), which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 04, 2022 had 55204 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: oil - 619 instances gas - 616 instances 2021 - 540 instances financial - 449 instances natural - 383 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
